detectors.description:
Starlight.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#123-128) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#125)
detectors.markdown:
[Starlight.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#L123-L128) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#L125)

detectors.description:
Starlight.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#136-142) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#137)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#139)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#10)
	- Starlight.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#110-112)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Starlight.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#119-121)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#11)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Starlight.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#144-146)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#12)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#13)
	- Starlight.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#123-128)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#14)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#15)
	- Starlight.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#136-142)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#36-39)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:

receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) should be declared external:
	- ApproveAndCallFallBack.receiveApproval(address,uint256,address,bytes) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Starlight.sol#52)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:

acceptOwnership() should be declared external:
